tasks.name: Verify Development Server Configuration
tasks.description: Confirm that the development server starts correctly on port 8080 without errors and that all configuration files are properly set up for the white screen fix.
tasks.notes: This is the foundation step - if server doesn't start correctly, all subsequent testing will fail

relatedFiles.description: Verify port configuration is set to 8080
Check npm scripts for dev command

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Read vite.config.ts to verify port is set to 8080
2. Start npm run dev command
3. Verify server starts without errors
4. Check that localhost:8080 is accessible
5. Capture startup logs for verification
tasks.verificationCriteria: Development server must start successfully on port 8080 without any console errors or warnings
tasks.analysisResult: Verify white screen problem resolution in JP Caster e-commerce project through systematic Playwright testing. The issue was caused by missing Shield icon import in Header.tsx and port configuration change. Solution requires comprehensive testing of all critical user flows including cart operations, authentication, navigation, and visual verification to prevent regression.
tasks.summary: Development server configuration verified successfully. Port 8080 is correctly configured in vite.config.ts (line 12), npm run dev script is properly set up in package.json (line 7), and the server starts successfully on localhost:8080 without any console errors or warnings. The output shows VITE v5.4.19 ready in 1530ms with proper network bindings.

tasks.name: Verify Icon Import Fixes
tasks.description: Confirm that all Lucide React icon imports are complete in Header.tsx and other components to prevent JavaScript runtime errors that cause white screen.
tasks.notes: Missing icon imports were the root cause of the white screen issue

relatedFiles.description: Verify Shield and all other icons are properly imported

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Read Header.tsx file and verify Shield icon is included in imports
2. Check all other icon usage in the file matches imports
3. Verify no missing icons that could cause runtime errors
4. Check other components for consistent icon import patterns
tasks.verificationCriteria: All icon imports must be complete and consistent with usage in the component
tasks.analysisResult: Verify white screen problem resolution in JP Caster e-commerce project through systematic Playwright testing. The issue was caused by missing Shield icon import in Header.tsx and port configuration change. Solution requires comprehensive testing of all critical user flows including cart operations, authentication, navigation, and visual verification to prevent regression.
tasks.summary: Icon import verification completed successfully. All Lucide React icon imports are complete and consistent with their usage throughout the application. The Shield icon (root cause of white screen issue) is properly imported and used in Header.tsx. No missing icon imports detected that could cause JavaScript runtime errors.

tasks.name: Create Comprehensive Playwright Test Suite
tasks.description: Develop a comprehensive Playwright test script that covers all critical user flows including homepage loading, cart operations, authentication, and navigation to verify no white screen occurs.
tasks.notes: This is the core testing component that will verify all functionality works correctly
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Create enhanced test script based on existing test-port-8080.mjs
2. Add homepage loading verification
3. Implement cart operations testing (add/remove items)
4. Add authentication flow testing (login/logout)
5. Include navigation testing (category pages, product details)
6. Add console error monitoring
7. Implement screenshot capture for visual verification
tasks.verificationCriteria: Test script must cover all critical user flows and capture screenshots and console logs for verification
tasks.analysisResult: Verify white screen problem resolution in JP Caster e-commerce project through systematic Playwright testing. The issue was caused by missing Shield icon import in Header.tsx and port configuration change. Solution requires comprehensive testing of all critical user flows including cart operations, authentication, navigation, and visual verification to prevent regression.
tasks.summary: Comprehensive Playwright test suite created successfully. The verify-white-screen-fix.mjs script covers all critical user flows including homepage loading, cart operations, authentication, navigation testing, console error monitoring, and screenshot capture. Features include detailed error reporting, visual verification, and automated test result generation with JSON output.

tasks.name: Execute Homepage and Basic Loading Tests
tasks.description: Run Playwright tests to verify homepage loads correctly, displays content, and has no white screen issues.
tasks.notes: This verifies the core white screen fix is working
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Navigate to localhost:8080 using Playwright
2. Wait for page to fully load
3. Verify page content is visible (not white screen)
4. Check for JavaScript console errors
5. Capture screenshot for visual verification
6. Verify all major page sections render correctly
tasks.verificationCriteria: Homepage must load completely with visible content and no console errors
tasks.analysisResult: Verify white screen problem resolution in JP Caster e-commerce project through systematic Playwright testing. The issue was caused by missing Shield icon import in Header.tsx and port configuration change. Solution requires comprehensive testing of all critical user flows including cart operations, authentication, navigation, and visual verification to prevent regression.
tasks.summary: Homepage and basic loading tests executed successfully. The homepage test PASSED, confirming no white screen issues. The application loads properly on localhost:8080 with visible content including Korean Caster logo, product categories, and main sections. Navigation test also passed, showing pages load correctly. Screenshot captured as homepage-test-1752838454299.png shows proper visual rendering.
